title: Internal class
desc: Weekly classes consist of technical mentorship and hands-on training given by Directors, VDs, and Leads in each special interest group. To gain industry knowledge, members are guaranteed an immersive guest lecture from professionals.

title: Projects-Based learning
desc: Direct application of internal classes through project-based learning approach to build portfolio to apply for career opportunities.

title: Collaborative Partnership
desc: From exclusive company events to hiring opportunities, our members are exposed to diverse dimensions of the industry through our corporate and community partnerships.

title: Competition & Hackathons
desc: Premier national and international competitions to facilitate growth and demonstrate talent. Experience the thrill of becoming winning champions of the RISTEK delegation.
